name: Episode
description: A media episode (e.g. TV, radio, video game) which can be part of a series or season.
title: Episode

fields.name: actor
fields.title: actor
fields.description: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

fields.name: partOfSeries
fields.title: partOfSeries
fields.description: The series to which this episode or season belongs.

fields.name: trailer
fields.title: trailer
fields.description: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

fields.name: partOfSeason
fields.title: partOfSeason
fields.description: The season to which this episode belongs.

fields.name: episodeNumber
fields.title: episodeNumber
fields.description: Position of the episode within an ordered group of episodes.

fields.name: director
fields.title: director
fields.description: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

fields.name: productionCompany
fields.title: productionCompany
fields.description: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.
